it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation

Class AbstractNSEWormhole2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation.AbstractNSEWormhole2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWormhole2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapWormhole, NSEWormhole

    public abstract class AbstractNSEWormhole2D
extends Object
implements IWormhole2D
    AbstractNSEWormhole2D = Abstract with No Side Effects Wormhole2D.
    Partial implementation for the interface IWormhole2D.
    I am considering the particular case of the view as an entity into the sceern-space: the y-axis grows on the bottom side of the screen.
